text: @realDonaldTrump You really need to stop calling it the “Chinese virus”.  It’s a pandemic that has hit every country. The reason why it’s raging out of control in this country is because you failed to deal with it for 2 months when you kept calling it a hoax. We should call it the #TrumpVirus.
